item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 22, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:

29. FTC takes action against Uber for deceptive billing and cancellation practices (368 points | 210 comments)
30. The Rise of Luxury Doomsday Prepping (14 points | 6 comments)
